parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> For waypoints attached to a house, this defines the target [[buildingPos]] index.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint '''setWaypointHousePosition''' pos

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos: [[Number]] - [[buildingPos]] index

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_grp, 2] [[setWaypointHousePosition]] 1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypoints]], [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointDescription]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointScript]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[waypointSpeed]], [[buildingPos]]
</value></part></template>
